title: There’s no need to hoard food — but falling loonie will raise your grocery bill
description: Sylvain Charlebois of Dalhousie University speaks about the state of our food supply chain and how the pandemic will effect food prices
content: Sylvain Charlebois of the School of Public Administration at Dalhousie University speaks with the Financial Post s Larysa Harapyn about why we re seeing empty shelves in stores amid the COVID pandemic the state of our food supply chain and how all this chars
